name: Instant WebKiosk/EDS
short_description:
Instant WebKiosk/EDS, Easy Digital Signage, is an operating system designed for digital signage installations on standard PC hardware (even diskless), which can handle both web and multimedia content. 

It displays a full-screen view restricted to the web page or playlist specified; there is no way to escape this view but rebooting the machine.

WEB VIEW displays HTML pages from an Internet or local area network resource (handled at your choose with Mozilla Firefox or Google Chromium);

MEDIA VIEW can show both a slideshow of images and a video player of Internet or local area network files.

It is a "live" (it boots from USB keys), Linux Debian-based, operating system: after the reset, Instant WebKiosk/EDS defaults to original values (for maximum security even if hacked) except for persistent settings (configurations), which persist across reboots.

Only the browser or the player will show up (no desktop environment). It can also be started from hard drive.
summary: A secure & easy digital signage operating system
